name: THE MOON TOWER, Pre-Alpha Version
description:
- some of which are for sure broken atm!

Skill tree in similar wonky state!

In the tower use the mouse to navigate, when fighting use
keyboard (mouse is required when selecting new weapons).

WASD to Move.
Arrow Keys to Look - Skills like Hook Shot and Musket
require you to tap in the direction you are already facing.
SPACE to Attack.
SHIFT for Magic Attacks (cooldown alerted by PING! sound).
CTRL for Class Abilities.

Bugged Skills (that I know of):
Wish Fullfilment
Rummager
Unshackled
All Charge Abilities ( second to last skills)
